attributes.action: Put up a page on the government website which shows the daily amounts of compensation paid out by government.
attributes.additional_details: There are daily reports of increasing amounts of government activity which is against the law which will incur a payment of compensation - usually to somebody who is not a contributor to the running costs of the country.  Taxpayers have a right to know how many of their taxpayer pounds are being used to pay for the criminal acts of their elected representatives, just how much their electeds criminal acts are costing them, when none of them has the approval of the electorate to carry out criminal acts in their name, and a website page, updated daily, is the ideal place for this to be achieved.
